about_the_game:
Enhancing everything players love about the freerunning nature of STRIDE, the full-fledged sequel 'Fates' pushes the parkour action formula even further with new story-oriented gameplay.

MEET YOUR FATE


Raised in the slums of dystopian Airon City, at the very bottom of food chain, you got a golden ticket out.

To survive and climb the ladder in elite police forces of SkyChase, you will have to deal with power shifts in gangs, dirty family feuds, corporate secrets, forbidden tech and much more.

Your fate is bound with other motley characters in this story. Will you accept the destiny or fight against it?

FEEL LIKE A PARKOUR SPEC-OPS OFFICER


◉ Climb buildings, vault through windows, and slide down cables with lightning speed.
◉ Explore major locations under the watch of snipers and drones.
◉ Engage in tactical close-quarters combat.
◉ Use your gadgets and hacking skills to outwit thugs and corporates.

From dirty slums to affluent skyscrapers, you will visit many places to enjoy the view and challenge your reflexes in action-packed gameplay.

TECHNOLOGICAL LEAP


Reworked STRIDE Engine now offers advanced levels of graphics, physics and interactivity on PCVR. We refined every aspect of the original STRIDE: shooting and weapons, enemy variety and their AI… the list goes on and on.

When you run, fight, interact with characters or solve puzzles, you will feel a major leap in technology.

ENTRY POINT INTO THE STRIDE UNIVERSE


‘Fates’ is a separate game that offers a smooth entry and deep gameplay mechanics to keep you hooked until the end-credits and beyond.

It is newcomer-friendly and doesn’t require your skills or knowledge from the original game. STRIDE: Fates is a great fit for everyone from narrative lovers to fitness enthusiasts.

Are you ready to step into the shoes of a parkour spec-ops officer?

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content

name: STRIDE: Fates

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-7500 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, OpenXR or OculusPC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 9700k or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, OpenXR or OculusPC

short_description: Step into the shoes of a parkour spec-ops officer. Traverse your way through the rooftops and basements of dystopian Airon City - from slums to affluent skyscrapers. Deal with power shifts in gangs, dirty family feuds, corporate secrets, forbidden tech, and other obstacles to understand your past.
